Member Enumeration Documentation

enum FT::CheckpointFile::State

Predefined state of the file that store checkpoint. During the checkpoint of context the state of the file is : 1 2 VOID-----> WRITE -----> VALID The transitions are: 1: begin of saving the contents of the context. 2: end of saving, the context has been checkpointed correctly and its states pass to the valid state.

Enumerator:
STATE_VOID 
STATE_WRITE 
STATE_VALID
